code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../Styles/search.css';import{addCart}from'../../redux/action';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Search(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const addProduct=product=>{dispatch(addCart(product));};useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setFilterData(data);});},[]);const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[filterData,setFilterData]=useState([]);const handleFilter=value=>{const res=filterData.filter(f=>f.title.toLowerCase().includes(value));setData(res);if(value===""){setData([]);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"search...",onChange:e=>handleFilter(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-result",children:data.map((product,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-1 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"card h-100 text-center p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,class:"card-img-top",alt:product.title,style:{width:"15rem"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{class:"card-title mb-0",children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{class:"card-text lead fw-bold",children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-shopping-cart me-1",onClick:()=>addProduct(product),children:" "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/products/".concat(product.id),className:"btn btn-light ms-2 px-3 py-2",children:"More Details"})]})]},product.id)}))})]});}export default Search;
